description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Lamingtons recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lamington,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Chocolate Lamingtons Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup cocoa powder (plus 1/2 cup cocoa powder for chocolate icing)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease a 20cm square cake pan and line with baking paper.
Sift flour, cocoa and baking powder into the bowl of an electric mixer.
Add sugar, butter, eggs and milk and beat on low until combined. Increase to medium and beat until colour is pale. Spoon mixture into prepared pan and smooth top with the back of a spoon.
Bake for 4045 minutes or until cooked. Cool in pan for 5 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack to cool. Use a serrated knife to cut cake into 16 squares.

Meanwhile, make the chocolate icing. Sift icing sugar and cocoa into a bowl. Add enough boiling water (about 140ml) to mix to a smooth pouring consistency. If the icing gets too thick while coating the cake, thin with a little more boiling water.
Place a wire rack over a baking tray. Divide coconut between 2 shallow bowls. Using a fork, dip a cake square into icing, turning carefully to coat. Roll in coconut and place on rack to set.
